title: pixel xl bricked , need help to attempt to unbrick it
content:
hello,

my pixel xl just died on me about 3 weeks ago , during regular use it just turned off and won't turn on since. i get no light/charge notice when i plug in to ac .

i believed it was a battery issue so i went and got it replaced but still nothing.

when i plug it in to my pc i get a device " Qualcomm HS-USB QDLoader 9008" .

after reading online about this i realized my pixel is "bricked" .

my pixel was 100% stock android , never installed roms/recovery or some thing like this .

i read on different forums that it is possible to unbrick it using QFIL or QPST software , please help .
